Seat {SEAT} has extra legroom but no recline due to the exit. There is no window at this row. The tray tables are in the armrests, making the armrests immovable and slightly reducing seat width. It can get very cold by the exits during flight. The overhead storage bin above these seats is smaller than normal, and a portion of it is reserved for emergency equipment storage.

Seat {SEAT} has a crew jump seat in front of it, so there is no floor storage available in front of the seat, nor is there a back pocket in the seat ahead.
